abstract: Islamic State claims responsibility for bombings of two luxury hotels frequented by foreigners in Baghdad, which killed 14 people and wounded 25 others.
lead_paragraph: The bombings late Thursday night took place inside the parking lots within the tight security bubbles of two luxury hotels, killing 14 people.

headline.main: ISIS Claims Deadly Car Bombings at Baghdad Hotels
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; Iraq: 14 Are Killed in Hotel Bombings

snippet: The bombings late Thursday night took place inside the parking lots within the tight security bubbles of two luxury hotels, killing 14 people.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
